### Make some vectors

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")

# Check class
class(marmots)
```

```{r}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 8.5)

# Check class
class(pika)

# Scalar multiplier
scalar_pika <- 5.2 * pika 
scalar_pika

```

```{r}
bananas <- c(1, 2, 3)
apples <- c(6, 7 , 8)

bananas + apples 
bananas - apples

bananas %*% apples
```

### Matrices

```{r}
my_values <- seq(from = 1, to = 10)

my_matrix <- matrix(data = my_values, nrow = 2, ncol = 5, byrow = TRUE)
my_matrix

5 * my_matrix

glimpse(penguins)


```
